answers.answer: You can drink water.. but nothing else
I also have mine tomorrow.  What my doctor told me is that I'm allowed to have water. Hope everything goes well..
I didn't have to fast! I was just told to not eat a lot of sugars! Usually if they don't specificy, then you're probably okay to eat... But maybe ask just in case.
Just had mine today..drink a lot of water..it helps your blood flow better when they draw your blood...happy drinking lol

question: I have a diabetes test tomorrow, I heard that you can't eat or drink anything before the test:( am I not allowed to drink water either???
